author: Ivan Mehta
title: Twitter sees 900% increase in hate speech towards China — because coronavirus
description: US President Donald Trump has often labeled the coronavirus as the “Chinese virus.” However, he’s not alone in blaming China, the origin of the COVID-19, for failing to contain the deadly disease. The pandemic has led tons of people online to constantly abuse…
content:
US President Donald Trump has often labeled the coronavirus as the Chinese virus. However, hes not alone in blaming China, the origin of the COVID-19, for failing to contain the deadly disease.
